DOC.brief_summary: to assess the effect of treatment with Sitagliptin (MK0431) on HbA1c (Hemoglobin A1c) and the safety and tolerability of Sitagliptin.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Sitagliptin in Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus With Inadequate Glycemic Control (MK0431-118)
DOC.criteria: Patients Who Are 18 Years Of Age With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Who Are Either: Not On Antihyperglycemic (AHa) Medication (Off For At Least 2 Months) Or On A Single AHa
